name: Chicken Kottu
recipe: A flavorful Sri Lankan street food with shredded roti, vegetables, and chicken stir-fried in aromatic spices.

name: Egg Roti
recipe: Traditional Egg Roti featuring a thin layer of roti wrapped around spiced scrambled eggs for a perfect blend of textures.

name: Mix Seafood Fried Rice
recipe: A delightful dish with assorted seafood creating a tasty and satisfying fried rice experience.

name: Hoppers
recipe: Experience the unique taste of Hoppers, bowl-shaped pancakes made from fermented rice flour and coconut milk.

name: Wild Boar Dewal
recipe: Savory Wild Boar Dewal with tender meat cooked to perfection in a blend of aromatic spices.

name: Fried Shrimp
recipe: Indulge in crispy Fried Shrimp, succulent prawns coated in a flavorful batter and deep-fried to perfection.

name: Chicken Curry
recipe: Enjoy the warmth and flavor of homemade Chicken Curry with tender pieces simmered in a rich and aromatic curry sauce.

name: Pittu
recipe: Savor the simplicity of Pittu, a Sri Lankan favorite made from steamed rice flour and coconut, served with a variety of delectable accompaniments.

name: Watalappan
recipe: Indulge in the rich and creamy flavors of Watalappan, a traditional Sri Lankan coconut custard pudding, offering a delightful taste of the island's culinary heritage
